message.content:
I need to identify the net addition in cash and cash equivalents and its component sub-items from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the statement, I can see:
- Under "Cash and Cash Equivalents" section, there is a "Net Increase" line showing "-757744.24"
- This appears to be the net addition (in this case, a decrease) in cash and cash equivalents
- The component sub-items would be the beginning and ending balances:
  - Beginning Balance: 8000000.00
  - Ending Balance: 7242255.76

The net increase/decrease can be calculated as Ending Balance - Beginning Balance:
7242255.76 - 8000000.00 = -757744.24

This confirms the value shown in the "Net Increase" line.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-757744.24', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value1': '8000000.00', 'sub_item value2': '7242255.76'}}}
```
